articles.title: Serious concerns after sickening incident
articles.description: Victorian cricketer Will Pucovski has been forced to retire hurt after copping a sickening blow to the helmet during the Sheffield Shield match against Tasmania in Hobart.
articles.content:
Victorian cricketer Will Pucovski has been forced to retire hurt after copping a sickening blow to the helmet during the Sheffield Shield match against Tasmania in Hobart.

articles.title: Macquarie, Julius Baer struggle over $US455m venture investment in India’s Byju’s
articles.description: Macquarie launched an investment effort named after Indian cricketer Virat Kohli into Byju Raveendran’s online education tech company.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
